Name: Lustful Assistant
About the game: Lustful Assistant is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story tells the story of a guy who hired a very sexy girl. Working together, they became very close. Their communication very quickly led to sex. In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a guy who worked hard and hard at work as a boss. At some point he needed an assistant. He hired a very sexy girl. She worked very well and helped him in everything, not only in work, but also in sex. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!
